communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

December 31, 2024
Food and Drug Administration
Division of Freedom of Information (HFI-35)

RE:  Freedom of Information Act request

Dear FOIA Officer:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, 5 U.S.C. § 552a, I am requesting the release of:
1.) previously closed FOIA request  as follows: 2024-448 01/16/2024 VA Center for Clinical Management Research	FDA Complete Response Letter to Amgen, Inc. Re: Supplemental New Drug Application for Sotorasib.  I would like the complete text of the Complete Response Letter sent to Amgen, Inc., stripped of proprietary information . 02/13/2024
2.) emails, phone calls, notes, records or any form of communication between FDA and Amgen regarding the Errata filed on the FDA's October 5, 2023 ODAC meeting.

I am a professional journalist writing for multiple outlets and have written numerous articles for The BMJ and other outlets.
 
As an investigative journalist, I request a waiver of fees associated with processing this FOIA request and duplicating responsive records.  

Thank you for your attention to this request.

Sincerely,


Jeanne Lenzer

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Jeanne Lenzer
